.. _index:

=======================
Different Blob Storages
=======================

NearBeach requires BLOB storage to house any uploads like documents, profile pictures etc. These will be stored in the BLOB storage.


.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 3
    :hidden:
    :caption: Use Different Blob Storages

    Azure Blob Storage </001-installation/different-blob-storage/azure>
    AWS S3 </001-installation/different-blob-storage/aws-s3>
    Minio </001-installation/different-blob-storage/minio>
